title: Devfolio
info: A minimal portfolio template for Developers.
It's a fully responsive Portfolio template for Developers with fully documented effortless configuration to get you up and running with your own Portfolio Website.

title: Recipes Counter
info: A full fullstack PWA firebase application
A full-stack PWA developed for my academics. It involves features such as authentication using email and password, involves CRUD operations and also works offline.

title: NeumiKeyboard
info: It's a fully Working Neumorphism Design Keyboard available in both light and dark mode.

title: Gradient Generator
info: A website for generating desired gradients.
You can generate both linear and radial gradients upto 3 colors on this website.

title: NeumiDigiClock
info: A Neumorphism Design Digital Clock Website.
A Digital Clock Website with 12-hour and 24-hour display format in both light and dark mode.

title: NeumiAnalogClock
info: A Neumorphism Design Analog Clock Website.
A Analog Clock Website developed using HTML5, CSS3 and VanillaJS, available in both light and dark mode.

title: MiniFolio
info: A Simple Portfolio website of mine.
I've used only HTML5 and CSS3 for this website. It has some cool animation effects for hovers.
